name: Sarah M
text:
This was our 1st time ordering here.
My works pizza is very good! The crust is nice and tasty. I asked for extra black olives and feel I didnt get that but I'll note that for next time. My son's ‚Ä¶More

name: BLK WDOYS
text: Horrible service and food is always cold. Every time I come to this Howie‚Äôs it smells like a dirty mop. Today I ordered bone in buffalo wings and this is what I got. Absolutely unacceptable

name: Flavia Longoria
text: Take out order s only .no seating available. The staff has been friendly. The order placing area looks clean. They are pretty fast with orders. I recommend

name: Brian Kirby
text: Ordered for the first time last night.  I can honestly say very fast delivery,  excellent quality.  Will definitely be ordering again soon .

name: Jonathan Morgan
text: Pretty good pizza great price would recommend

name: Amber W
text: Michigan native here. I haven't had Hungry Howies in years. It was nice to see one nearby. My daughter attends gymnastics just off the 99 so it isn't too far out of our way (5 min max). I ordered a pizza online and picked it up in store. My ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew White
text: Worked there for a little. Wished they were more busy. Just seems after 2 years of being open and the positive reviews on here would bring people in. It really doesn‚Äôt.

name: justin mcknight
text:
Worked there for one day last year, next day owner closed store for bankruptcy issues and never paid me even after months of assuring he would.
Management was a joke, food was good. Hope they cleaned up their act and got a better owner since I was last there.

name: DANIELLE VOS
text: It was really good, especially the crust! I wish the crust on the bottom was flavored as well!

name: Dorrell Russ
text: It's not always quality consistent. Depends on the crew and skill of the workers. I believe,  during evening hours you get better quality due to crew experience. :-)

name: Shagun Shukla
text: I like the different flavored crust options available here

name: Christina Roberts
text: We have not had hungry howies pizza in a few years. It was just like we remembered! Caleb was super nice and fixed is right up!

name: John Doe
text: Didn't actually eat there but my car broke down and they let me chill there for a bit. Very friendly service and the food looks good enough

name: TheJsmiles33
text: This place had molded pan crust pizza and serving it to customers. I ordered a pan pepperoni pizza from this establishment for ten bucks, if I could only give no stars for the disrespect of giving me and my family molded pizza crust. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Natalie Roberts
text: Love the pizza choices with the asiago cheese crust, cheese bread and cinnamon bread. Prices are good too.

name: Bruce McCaffety
text: Hungry Howie's is famous for its flavored crust. They have many different opinions. Our favorite is the butter crust. We also like the garlic herb and the Cajun. The pizza itself is really good too. It has become our new go to pizza place. ‚Ä¶More

name: Douglas Fresh
text: Too far away and the oven baked sub, barely had any meat in it.

name: michelle rdz
text: The pizza is delicious! It was my first time here today, and not only is the pizza good,  the young man at the register had outstanding customer service. I'll gladly come back.

name: Veronica Lissette Mercado
text: They are awesome! The pizza is so good!

name: Adam Ruffolo
text: Friendly staff.  Great service.  Very quick.  Loved the food!

name: Tamiaa Hamilton
text:
GREAT LOCATION
Caleb is super helpful and polite wonderful staff . Great food and customer service. #recommended

name: Sara SKO
text: First time ordering.. I work at a dealership in spring and several of us ordered online. I loved that they except separate payments online! I'm also a big fan of marinara sauce and they had a great recipe! Price was great and there was no minimum for delivery. I'll definitely order from Hungry Howie's again.

name: Tamara Sutton
text: I love HH... It reminds me of back home in Michigan.

name: Patrick Barrera
text: The quality of the pizza was a little bit above little Ceasar's. Ready lightning fast. Friendly service. The sauce was a bit too acid for my taste. Personal pizza is rare for a chain, but if you have a pizza craving it's cheap and fast. ‚Ä¶More

name: Rocky M
text: Ordered online at 7:55 p.m. online quote time was 40 minutes. I checked the orders progress exactly an hour later and it said the order was still being prepared. I called up there and was told that my order was in fact ready but the driver ‚Ä¶More

name: Luis Rivera
text:
Quick easy, just wish they delivered.
YUM!!! Better than papa johns! Flavor crust is optional which is great‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è So not to much grease we like to dip it :)!
The Howie bread is to die for!!! 11 stars from us.

name: Dominica Hertel
text: Great atmosphere, clean and cozy restaurant, delicious pizza. The staff were very friendly and the food was perfect!

name: Eric Lewis
text: Very clean place. Very good service as well. Ordered a medium pizza and was out the door in 10min.üëçüèª

name: Charles Castillo
text: Fast fast service.  Hit the order button and 15 minutes later they were at the house. Great Italian subs and pizza was ok too. I ordered the large sub and it was big enough to feed 2 people.

name: Tamara Davis
text: Today I drove all the way from Humble specifically for Hungry Howies. I purposely didn‚Äôt call in my order or order online so that my pizza would be fresh. I walked in, there was a man who (I‚Äôm assuming) was making pizzas and another ‚Ä¶More

name: Theodis Butler
text: Pizza was great and the drivers are awesome!

name: john hulstrunk
text: Newish, clean, friendly service. Food cooked perfectly.

name: giovanni montes
text: I really enjoyed their pizza so many choices on how it's made I had my pepperoni pizza with cheese in the crust & butter cheese

name: Jessica Gomez
text: Went to this location today. Young lady at the counter was friendly and helpful. I was so glad to see a Hungry Howies in the area. Were I lived previously the Hungry Howies closed many years ago. I wish we were in the delivery area. We really enjoyed our pizzas and look forward to our next visit!

name: Rigo Tovar
text: Went in, some guy with a howie's hat was sitting outside. No one greeted me. I was in there for a little while. Nobody bothered to look toward the front to notice a customer. Says a lot. Was going to get something. But i guess not. Was in ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephanie Sue
text: I ordered the philly sub and a ham sub... Soaked in butter... Soaked in grease... The Philly tasted like frost-bite... Down right yuck.... Good service..  Good people but just told much grease or butter in the crust...

name: Captain Chaos
text: I wish there were more of these in Houston, hopefully there will be more franchises opening. Employees are great and friendly!

name: Lala Lozano
text: The last 3 times i order ordered from this place they have messed my food up. The managers dont really care and dont even apologize,  just offer you a credit. I really just wanted  my food  remade.  Dont need a credit  cause I will not be back to buy anything  from them

text: Great place loved the pizza and manager was so friendly

name: Ruby Badillo

text: So we just got our ordered from this place. I felt horrible bc it was 12 mins before they closed 11pm. I had been on my feet and just got off work and no food at the hotel. Vincent took my order he was so great and very sweet. By the time ‚Ä¶More
